full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Renewal of Annual Support for EMC SAN and Fiber Switches

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number (Numero de Référence):** SSC-23-00023596:T
* **Tender Title (Titre):** Renewal of Annual Support for EMC SAN and Fiber Switches
* **Publication Date (Date de Publication):** 2023-08-21
* **Tender Closing Date (Date d'appel Offres):** 2023-09-01T14:00:00
* **Geographic Regions of Opportunity (Régions d'Opportunités Géographiques):** Canada
* **Regions for Project Delivery (Régions de Livraison du Projet):** Ontario (except NCR)

## Brief Description of Contract

This tender notice is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the renewal of annual support for EMC Storage Area Network (SAN) and Fiber switches. The proposed solution will ensure the continued operation and maintenance of these critical IT assets to support the end-user entities.

## Procurement Category

* **Procurement Category:** General Direct Purchase (GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity and End-User Entities

* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **End-User Entities:** Shared Services Canada

## Contract Description

The proposed solution will provide the following:

* EMC SAN and Fiber switches support and maintenance services
* Technical support and assistance for SAN and Fiber switches
* Troubleshooting and repair services for SAN and Fiber switches
* Performance optimization and upgrade services for SAN and Fiber switches

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name (Nom):** Eleanor Cesare
* **Contact Email (Courriel):** eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone (Téléphone):** 613 219-8366
* **Contact Fax (Télécopie):** 613 960-6026
* **Contact Address:** 180 Kent Street, 13th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
